html:
Purchase Order
{{doc.name}}

{{doc.supplier_name}}
{% if doc.address_display %}
{{doc.address_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.contact_display %}
{{doc.contact_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.contact_mobile %}
{{doc.contact_mobile}}
{%- endif -%}
{{doc.transaction_date}}
{{doc.customer_name}}
{% if doc.shipping_address_display %}
{{doc.shipping_address_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.customer_contact_display %}
{{doc.customer_contact_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.customer_contact_mobile %}
{{doc.customer_contact_mobile}}
{%- endif -%}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Name Description Qty Rate Amount
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_name }} {% if row.item_code != row.item_name -%}
Item Code: {{ row.item_code}} {%- endif %}
{{ row.description }}
 {{ row.qty }} {{ row.uom or row.stock_uom }} {{ row.get_formatted("rate", doc) }} {{ row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
{{doc.total}}
{{doc.grand_total}}
{{doc.in_words}}
name: Drop Shipping Format

html:
{{ company }}
{{ __("POS No : ") }} {{ offline_pos_name }}

{{ __("Customer") }}: {{ customer }}

{{ __("Date") }}: {{ dateutil.global_date_format(posting_date) }}

{% for item in items %} {% endfor %}
{{ __("Item") }} {{ __("Qty") }} {{ __("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_name }} {{ format_number(item.qty, null,precision("difference")) }}
@ {{ format_currency(item.rate, currency) }}		 {{ format_currency(item.amount, currency) }}
{% for row in taxes %} {% if not row.included_in_print_rate %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% if discount_amount %} {% endif %}
{{ __("Net Total") }} {{ format_currency(total, currency) }}
{{ row.description }} {{ format_currency(row.tax_amount, currency) }}
{{ __("Discount") }} {{ format_currency(discount_amount, currency) }}
{{ __("Grand Total") }} {{ format_currency(grand_total, currency) }}
{{ __("Paid Amount") }} {{ format_currency(paid_amount, currency) }}
{{ __("Qty Total") }} {{ qty_total }}

{{ terms }}

{{ __("Thank you, please visit again.") }}
name: Point of Sale
GST Tax Invoice

html:
{% if letter_head %} {{ letter_head }} {% endif %}

{{ doc.company }}
{% if doc.company_address_display %} {% set company_address = doc.company_address_display.replace("\n", " ").replace("
", " ") %} {% if "GSTIN" not in company_address %} {{ company_address }} {{ _("GSTIN") }}:{{ doc.company_gstin }} {% else %} {{ company_address.replace("GSTIN", "
GSTIN") }} {% endif %} {% endif %}
{% if doc.docstatus == 0 %} {{ doc.status + " "+ (doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice")) }}
{% else %} {{ doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice") }}
{% endif %}

{{ _("Receipt No") }}: {{ doc.name }}
{{ _("Cashier") }}: {{ doc.owner }}
{{ _("Date") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }}
{{ _("Time") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_time") }}
{% if doc.grand_total > 50000 %} {% set customer_address = doc.address_display.replace("\n", " ").replace("
", " ") %} {{ _("Customer") }}:
{{ doc.customer_name }}
{{ customer_address }} {% endif %}

{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
{{ _("Item") }} {{ _("Qty") }} {{ _("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_code }} {%- if item.item_name != item.item_code -%}
{{ item.item_name }} {%- endif -%} {%- if item.gst_hsn_code -%}
{{ _("HSN/SAC") }}: {{ item.gst_hsn_code }} {%- endif -%} {%- if item.serial_no -%}
{{ _("SR.No") }}:
{{ item.serial_no | replace("\n", ", ") }} {%- endif -%} 		{{ item.qty }}
@ {{ item.rate }}		 {{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}
{% if doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print %} {% else %} {% endif %} {%- for row in doc.taxes -%} {%- if (not row.included_in_print_rate or doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print) and row.tax_amount != 0 -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.rounded_total -%} {%- endif -%} {%- for row in doc.payments -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.change_amount -%} {%- endif -%}
{{ _("Total Excl. Tax") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("net_total", doc) }} {{ _("Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("total", doc) }}
{% if '%' in row.description %} {{ row.description }} {% else %} {{ row.description }}@{{ row.rate }}% {% endif %} {{ row.get_formatted("tax_amount", doc) }}
{{ _("Discount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("discount_amount") }}
{{ _("Grand Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total") }}
{{ _("Rounded Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("rounded_total") }}
{{ row.mode_of_payment }} {{ row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
{{ _("Paid Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("paid_amount") }}
{{ _("Change Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("change_amount") }}

{{ doc.terms or "" }}

{{ _("Thank you, please visit again.") }}
name: GST POS Invoice

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Cedente/prestatore (fornitore) Cessionario/committente (cliente)

Identificstivo fiscale ai fini IVA: {{frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier, "tax_id")}}

Codice fiscale: {{frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier, "fiscal_code")}}

Denominazione: {{frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier, "supplier_name")}}

Regime fiscale: {{frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier, "fiscal_regime")}}

Indrizo: {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.supplier_address, "address_line1")}}

Commune: {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.supplier_address, "city")}} Provincia: {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.supplier_address, "state_code")}}

Cap: {{(frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.supplier_address, "pincode")) or " "}} Nazione: {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.supplier_address, "country")}}

Identificstivo fiscale ai fini IVA: {{frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "tax_id")}}

Codice fiscale: {{frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "fiscal_code")}}

Denominazione: {{doc.company}}

Indrizo: {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.shipping_address, "address_line1")}}

Commune: {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.shipping_address, "city")}} Provincia: {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.shipping_address, "state_code")}}

Cap: {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.shipping_address, "pincode")}} Nazione: {{frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.shipping_address, "country")}}

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
